dashboardDefaults.certificationsSnackbarBody: Find certification programs you may be eligible for in the “For You” section on this page.
dashboardDefaults.fundingSnackbarBody: Update your [business profile](/profile) to get personalized funding recommendations in the “For You” section on this page.
dashboardDefaults.calendarSnackbarBody: Find your next reporting due date at the bottom of this page.

dashboardDefaults.taxRegistrationSnackbarHeading: We marked the “Register for State Taxes and Employer Purposes” task complete.
dashboardDefaults.taxRegistrationSnackbarBody: State certifications can give you new government contracting opportunities. Your certification options now appear in the “For You” section.
dashboardDefaults.additionalBusinessSnackbarBody: You can switch between your businesses in your account drop down menu.
